import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Validation from '../components/validation' const Login = () => { const [logs, setLogs] = [{ email: "", pass: "" }] const [errors, setErrors] = [{}] const handleInput = (event) => { setLogs( prev => ({...prev, [event.target.name] : [event.target.value]})) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setErrors(Validation(logs)); } return (
Member Login
{errors.email && {errors.email}}
{errors.password && {errors.password}}
Login
Forgot Username / Password?
) } export default Login
